mapper.sql: SELECT s.social_id, s.user_id, s.content, s.image_url, s.image_height, s.tags, s.status, s.create_time, s.update_time, COUNT(DISTINCT l.like_id) as like_count, COUNT(DISTINCT c.comment_id) as comment_count, u.avatar, u.nick_name, u.user_name FROM master_social s LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN master_social_like l ON s.social_id = l.social_id LEFT JOIN master_social_comment c ON s.social_id = c.social_id AND c.status = '0'
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( s.status = '0' AND s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.content like concat('%', #{content}, '%') AND s.tags like concat('%', #{tags}, '%')
GROUP BY s.social_id, s.user_id, s.content, s.image_url, s.image_height, s.tags, s.status, s.create_time, s.update_time, u.avatar, u.nick_name, u.user_name ) t ORDER BY t.like_count DESC, t.create_time DESC ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
select count(1) from master_social_like where social_id = #{socialId} and user_id = #{userId}

SELECT * FROM ( 1=1 AND s.status = #{status} AND s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.content like concat('%', #{content}, '%') AND s.tags like concat('%', #{tags}, '%')
GROUP BY s.social_id, s.user_id, s.content, s.image_url, s.image_height, s.tags, s.status, s.create_time, s.update_time, u.avatar, u.nick_name, u.user_name ) t ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into master_social ( user_id, content, image_url, image_height, tags, status, create_time ) values ( #{userId}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{imageHeight}, #{tags}, #{status}, sysdate() )
